name: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and moist chocolate cake topped with smooth chocolate frosting.

name: Vanilla Sponge Cake
description: Light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake with a creamy filling.

name: Red Velvet Cake
description: A soft red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting.

name: Carrot Cake
description: A moist carrot cake with walnuts and cream cheese frosting.

name: Lemon Drizzle Cake
description: A tangy lemon cake with a sweet lemon drizzle topping.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
description: A delightful shortcake with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.

name: Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

name: Mango Mousse Cake
description: A delicious mango mousse layered on a soft sponge cake.

name: Tiramisu Cake

name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
description: A rich chocolate cake with a thick chocolate fudge frosting.
